Technovation

IEEE R10 Event

TechnoVation is a technical cum leadership enhancement event involving a range of activities that enhance leadership skills. The event will start off with a workshop on leadership skills involved in leading IEEE affiliated organizations as well as benefits of IEEE membership keeping in mind the objective of 'LEADERSHIP TRAINING AND DEVELOPMENT PROGRAM'. It will be followed by a coding event where the budding coders can get a chance to showcase their technical skills and a 14 hour long hardware hackathon that not only involves testing of technical skills but also how leadership skills are applied to solve problems more effectively. The event will enable enhancement of leadership skills and their application in solving technical problems in order to come up with the most optimum solution agreeable by all. The event also brings about more awareness in terms of how IEEE affiliated organizations are led and their functioning.

Participate And Have Fun !!

  • Last Month : Sept. 29, 2019, 12PM to 12 AM

  • MS APARNA SHUKLA
  • Sept 13, 2019, 2:30pm
  • Senate Hall, Admin Block

Introduction to Deep Learning Theory and Practical Applications

EXPERT TALK BY MS APARNA SHUKLA

"Artificial intelligence is the new electricity"üí°
Aren't we all are driven by AI and fascinated by how machines are able to do things which humans are considered to be good at? Just imagine, how amazing it would be to be able to make machines follow what you want.
So this Engineer's Dayüíª, to make this imagination come to reality, WIE IEEE PEC in collaboration with CSIO brings you session on "Introduction to Deep Learning Theory and Practical Applications" by Ms. Aparna Akula, Senior Scientist, Computational Instrumentation Department, CSIO. She is B.Tech in Electrical and Electronics Engineering at National Institute of Technology, Warangal in 2008, M.Tech in Advanced Instrumentation Engineering from Academy of Scientific and Innovative Research (AcSIR) in 2011. Her research interests are in Computer Vision, Signal & Image Processing, Machine Intelligence and Multi Sensor Data Fusion.

Registrations Closed

  • DR. ABDUL QUAIYUM ANSARI
  • Sept 9, 2019, 3:00pm
  • Senate Hall, Administrative Block

Neutrosophic Logic: A Paradigm Shift in Soft Computing

EXPPERT TALK BY DR. ABDUL QUAIYUM ANSARI

Over the years of technical development, Engineers have been able to use logic to create solutions to problems. However, some factors like uncertainty and ambiguity encompass the shortcomings of every logic studied in the past. Neutrosophic logic, recently proposed by Florentine Smarandache, represents these factors through a mathematical model which has proved to be a major shift in the field soft computing.
To acquaint people with the technological aspect of this major event, IEEE, PEC brings to you, a session on "Neutrosophic Logic: A Paradigm Shift in Soft Computing", by Dr. Abdul Quaiyum Ansari, a Professor in the Department of Electrical Engineering at Jamia Millia Islamia, New Delhi. Prof. Ansari has successfully guided 15 PhDs, 20 M. Tech. dissertations, and owns two Indian Patent applications, 60 Peer Reviewed International Journal papers, one book each written and edited, 10 Book Chapters, and 90 Conference papers. He is a Senior Member of IEEE, Fellow and Chartered Engineer of the Institution of Engineers (India) and IETE. He is the recipient of the Rajarambapu Patil National Award for Promising Engineering Teacher for Creative Work Done in Technical Education for the year 2011 awarded by the Indian Society for Technical Education, New Delhi.

Registrations Closed

Basic Electronics + Manual Bot Making Workshop

LEARN BASICS OF MAKING BOTS

Are you someone with a passion for machines, robots, and want to build one of your own but don't know how to do that? Here is the solution!
IEEE , ROBOTICS and SESI present to you, their first workshop for the semester, Basic Electronics Workshop, in which you will learn about the basics of how to use various components and Manual Bot making Workshop, in which you will get a hands-on experience of how to put your knowledge to use.
